attributes.description:
In the market for the perfect SUV for the adventures with the family? Look no further! Very well looked after! 
Full Service History with Agents, Spare Key, Electric Windows, One Owner, Side Steps, Towbar, Multi Function Steering, Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera. 
4 X New Tyres Fitted!! 

DEKRA Roadworthy.
DEKRA Multi Point Check Completed. 

Finance & Insurance can be arranged. (T's & C's) 
We are an approved MFC, Wesbank & Standard Bank dealer.
Trade-ins accepted.
Mechanical Warranty Available.
Contact us for more information regarding this vehicle or simply complete the contact form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
George Auto - Miles of Smiles

attributes.description: At chat2cars, We pride ourselves in reliable affordable Cars. Where we provide all variety of cars, from low budget/economy cars to classy /Luxurious cars, at the most affordable price compared to any other car site or car dealer. We pride ourselves in customer satisfaction. We also do not just sell cars, we care about cars, and we provide a 360 security measure around cars, Hence we provide Tracking devices that enables you to switch on or off your car using any phone. We have vast experience in the automobile industry and we guarantee that our staffs are professional and all our cars go through DEKRA inspection before delivery is done. visit us today at 93 Grayston drive Sandton City, Johannesburg. for that dream car. www.chat2cars.co.za
